title: PS5 Event Revealed - Kinda Funny Games Daily 05.29.20
description:
IT'S HAPPENING! June 4th, PlayStation is showing us PS5 games. Alanah Pearce from Funhaus talks to Greg about the big news! 

Time Stamps - 
 00:03:02 - Housekeeping
IT’S OUR 700TH EPISODE! We’ll close out the show with Kenny Belou’s traditional stat breakdown.
It’s Kinda Funhaus week! We’re doing all sorts of crossover content with our pals at Funahus, like this episode of KFGD, but to catch the full rundown, head over to kindafunny.com/funhaus
tlou
Our huge Predator stream is today! 2 pm PT twitch.tv/kindafunnygames!
Today our only sponsors are our Patreon Producers, so please be like them and head over to patreon.com/kindafunnygames to support this show, get it ad-free, and get the exclusive post show. Thank you MOHAMMED MOHAMMED and BLACK JACK.
The Roper Report   -
00:06:54 - PS5 Event Next week, Jim Ryan
00:16:00 - The PS5 event is next Thursday. Assuming it's what we all hope, does this mean preorders will open soon?  - Best Friends Q:Marc Starvaggi
00:20:15 - Do you think this event will parallel the PS4 reveal, which was great but widely criticized for not, you know, revealing the box? - Best Friends Q:Malcontent Ronin
00:32:50 - Kojima Had a Major Project Fall Through, Death Stranding was a Success, Andy Robinson @ VGC
00:38:00 - Out today
00:45:00 -  Twitch Prime
 Reader mail   -
00:49:35 -  - Borzen00
00:55:31 - Squad Up: Lucas(PS4) - Universe616luke
00:56:10 - EPISODE 700 STATS FROM KENNY BELOU
00:59:00 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts:
MONDAY: Blessing and Tim
TUESDAY: Blessing and Imran
